Articles.Content:
Most of us know that you can increase your resolution by changing the configuration file but will Squad be making a official 1080P option? Perhaps the engine cannot support 1080P or perhaps there are performance issues when stretched to full HD? Does anyone know why there isn't one and if there is a plan to do so, when will it be?

ShadowLessKnight

"1080P" simply means the resolution 1920x1080, and is already in the game, freely available in the in-game settings. Don't even have to change any configuration files. The engine has no trouble at all running full HD or beyond. Personally I'm running 1920x1200 without any problems, and see no reason why it shouldn't scale even higher just fine.

Edited September 7, 2014 by Bluntie

Erm, i'm fairly certain there is an official option in the settings for 1080p? Or am I missing something?

GAH! Ninja'd.
The game already has support for 1920x1080 and higher resolutions. I play on an UHD monitor and I get 3840x2160 resolution option in the graphics menus. Works just fine on my PC.
I think OP meant 1080x680. I'd like if there was such an option, because my monitor is 1366x768 and thus cannot use it in windowed mode because stock resolution is bigger than that.

If for some reason the in-game options won't display your desired resolution, simply navigate to your KSP folder*, find the config.cfg file, and edit the resolution lines to whatever you wish to use.

Press Ctrl + F in the config and search for resolution, its a short way down from the top.

These are the droi-... entries you are looking for.....

"SCREEN_RESOLUTION_WIDTH = 1920

SCREEN_RESOLUTION_HEIGHT = 1200"

* Example directory for a STEAM KSP install

C:\SteamLibrary\SteamApps\common\Kerbal Space Program\config.cfg

I do believe that the menu will not display resolutions larger than your screen's native resolution, so if 1920x1080 doesn't show up it's probably because you don't have a 1080p display.

So I finally managed, the mouse clicks don't quite work for some reason and I get terrible motion sickness:-/

How to:

download auto hotkey from here http://www.autohotkey.com/

create a txt file and copy

^!f::

WinGetTitle, currentWindow, A

IfWinExist %currentWindow%

{

WinSet, Style, ^0xC00000 ; toggle title bar

WinMove, , , 0, 0, 3200, 1080

}

return

^^ that into it, make sure you adjust the last 4x2 numbers to your total screensize. and change the file extension to ahk.

double click -> open KSP and press CTRL ALT F -> profit and vomit on your keyboard. No seriously, I feel sick.
